resources.string: B.D. Educational Consultants is a recognized company, having its offices both in Russia and in different cities in India. The Vision of the company is to help Indian students to attain a Medical Doctorate degree (MBBS / BDS) in Russia at a affordable prize which is recognized both by World Health Organization and The Medical Council of India. B.D.E.C. Works with 10 Governmental Medical Universities in Russia for the past 4 years. In the course we have managed to send 100 students across Russia. B.D. Educational Consultants is lead by Mrs. Wendy Denzil Dmello. Our Services are open to everyone that needs help. Thank you.
